title: Fraction
text: We want to include only values of the input that do not force the denominator to be zero.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: We can set the denominator equal to $$0$$ and solve for $$x$$. What is the value of $$x$$?

title: Real Line
text: Now, we will exclude $$\frac{-1}{2}$$ from the domain. The answers are all real numbers where $$x<\frac{-1}{2}$$ or $$x>\frac{-1}{2}$$. We can use a symbol known as the union, U, to combine the two sets.
